title.en: Slime Blossom: A Reincarnated Genius in a New World

description.en: Taiga Hiiragi, a delinquent, lived a life consumed by daily brawls. One day, Noel, a genius slime reincarnated from another world, appears before him. When Taiga finds himself in a pinch during a fight, Noel uses his intellect to help him out. Then Noel declares to Taiga, “Slimes and Yankees(delinquents) should go to Tokyo University!!” Noel claims he’s here to help Taiga pass the Tokyo University entrance exam, but…?

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

altTitles.ja: スタンド使いほむら☆ジョジョカ

description.en:
As a group of magical girls fight a witch, a delinquent suddenly appears out of the blue! Afterwards, their stories begin to intersect in a bizarre way...

The plotline of Madoka Magica, with elements of a bizarre adventure!

title.en: For Some Reason, My Rabbit Familiar is Madly in Love with Me

altTitles.ja: なぜか使い魔のウサギは僕を溺愛しすぎてる

altTitles.ja-ro: Naze ka Tsukai ma no Usagi wa Boku wo Dekiai Shisugiteru

description.en: Aidan McGuire is a new magician in the ‘Guardians of the Order’. Every Guardian has a humanoid familiar, and summoning one is mandatory! But during the summoning ceremony, Aidan summons a cute rabbit! He was told ‘deeper contact’ was necessary for the familiar to showcase its true power… so when he tried kissing it, the rabbit disappeared and a young man named ‘Jougasaki Hidetora’ appeared in its place! A cute (?!) fantasy BL story about a magician with a vague memory of some other life.

altTitles.ja: メッシュ

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

altTitles.ja: イーヴォー

description.en:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
description.es: Trabajar, dormir, trabajar, dormir... qué existencia más aburrida. ¡¿Para qué vivir?! Sin esperanzas, sin sueños. Todo es tan previsible... El suicidio es la única salvación. Pero cuando te despiertas en el infierno... ¿Y si resulta que es el mismo mundo que abandonaste? Solo queda una opción. Pongamos este maldito mundo patas arriba.

description.en:
A lonely girl finds solace in her bag full of memories; now it's time for her to break through her shell.

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

altTitles.vi: Hãy cho tôi thấy tình yêu của cậu

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？
description.pt-br: Komichi Shijou, a pessoa mais famosa da escola, estava preocupada. Apesar de ser uma artista de mangá de comédia romântica, ela não tinha nenhuma compreensão do "sentimento do amor" e estava presa em uma crise criativa. Um dia, um certo garoto e uma garota aparecem diante dela. Com a chegada deles, a investigação de Komichi Shijou sobre o "amor genuíno" começa...!?

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: ウィッチ ウォッチ

description.en: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.
description.ne:
निको वाकात्सुकीले आफ्नो छ वर्षको बोक्सीको तालिम पूरा गरिसकेकी छिन् र उनी आफैं सहरमा सर्दैछिन्। नयाँ बोक्सीको रूपमा, उसले आफ्नो साथ दिनको लागि परिचित छनोट गर्नुपर्छ। यद्यपि, अन्य बोक्सीहरू भन्दा फरक, उनी गैर-जन्तु परिचित छान्न चाहन्छिन्। मोरिहितो "मोई" ओतोगी भन्दा राम्रो साथी कोही छैन - उनको बाल्यकालको साथी जो एक औघ राक्षस हुन्। मोरिहितो उनको नोकर हुनुको कडा विरोध गर्छन्, तर उनले बोक्सीको आदेशको अवज्ञा गरेमा श्रापले उनलाई अनौठो गाई-बाघ हाइब्रिडमा फर्काउनेछ भनेर थाहा पाएपछि उनले आफ्नो भाग्यलाई अनिच्छुकतासाथ स्वीकार गर्छन्।

मोरिहितोका बुबा व्यवसायिक यात्राको लागि जानुभएको कारण र निकोकी आमा बोक्शीहरुको पवित्र भूमिमा पछाडि रहनुभएको कारण, दुई किशोरहरूले आफूलाई एउटै छानामुनि सँगै बसेको भेट्टाए। जबकि निको आफ्नो क्रशसँग बाँच्न पाउँदा उत्साहित छिन्, मोरिहितोले पत्ता लगाए कि उनको जादुई गतिविधि र समग्र अनाड़ीपनले समाधान भन्दा बढी समस्याहरू सिर्जना गर्छ। एक वर्ष भित्र निकोमा आउने भविष्यवाणी गरिएको प्रकोपको साथ, मोरिहितोले आफ्नो अंगरक्षकको रूपमा रक्षा गर्नको लागि सक्दो गर्नुपर्दछ र साथै आफ्नो परिचितको रूपमा आफ्नो कर्तव्यहरू पालना गर्नुपर्नेछ।
description.pt: Morihito, um menino com a força de um ogro, está prestes a começar a viver com sua amiga de infância, Niko, que está treinando para ser feiticeira. A magia de Niko os leva a todos os tipos de problemas imprevisíveis, e com dois adolescentes sob o mesmo teto… Que as travessuras fantásticas comecem! Uma série de comédia de magia de Kenta Shinohara, criador de SKET DANCE e Astra Perdido no Espaço.
description.ru:
Морихито, парень с демонической силой, начинает жить вместе со своей подругой детства Нико, которая учится быть ведьмой. Магия Нико приводит ко всяким непредсказуемым проблемам, а уж когда два подростка остаются под одной крышей… да начнутся фантастические выходки!  
Магический комедийный сериал от Кенты Синохары, автора «SKET DANCE» и «Астра, затерянная в космосе».
description.uk:
Моріхіто, хлопець з силою оні, ось-ось почне жити разом зі своєю подругою дитинства Ніко, яка навчається на відьму. Магія Ніко призводить до всіляких непередбачуваних неприємностей, а коли двоє підлітків живуть під одним дахом... Фантастичні витівки починаються!
Магічний комедійний серіал від Кента Шінохари, творця “SKET DANCE” та "Загублена в космосі Астра".

altTitles.ja: わたしの家族飼育日記

description.en:
When he woke up, he was in a room he didn't recognize. A little girl, Lulu, called him "Big Brother."

"We're all here, I'll go get Dad!" Then Lulu left the room with a bright smile. He didn't know where he was. And he didn't have a sister. In an instant, the door opened. Something came with a rattling sound.

Something called "Dad" entered the living room.

A high concentration of mystery and fear is chained together in this crazy situational thriller. If you read this, you will be part of our "family" from today.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !

description.en: Tsuji, a high school student whose sister was killed by a spirit several years before the beginning of the story, joins his school's Paranormal Research Club after hearing rumours of its president being a brilliant exorcist, hoping to gain the skills necessary to avenge his deceased sister.

altTitles.ja: 許嫁協定

description.en: Kaneda Wataru tries to be less of a burden to his busily working mother and takes on lots of part-time programming jobs. During times like these, on Wataru's first day in his 2nd year of high school, three girls suddenly appear, kiss him and claim that one of them will have to become his future fiancée…
description.pt-br: Wataru tem dificuldade de lembrar sua infância. Seus pais se divorciaram e, desde então, ele tem feito o seu melhor para diminuir o trabalho de sua mãe. No primeiro dia de aula seu passado vem a tona em forma de três amigos de infância, mulheres , e toda querem se casar com ele … E sua vizinha, Tomo, parece gostar dele também.

altTitles.en: Mako-san Will Not Be Independent Even If It Kills Her

altTitles.ja: マコさんは死んでも自立しない

altTitles.zh-hk: 真子小姐她死都不想自立

altTitles.ru: Мако не будет независимой, даже если это убьёт её

description.en: It's been one year since Rin moved to Tokyo for high school. He was told by the landlord of his apartment that he didn't have to pay rent if he takes care of the landlord's granddaughter, which he immediately accepted. However, that granddaughter, Mako, ended up being a 20 year old college student who is completely incapable of taking care of herself. Even so, it was love at first sight for Rin, and he's been taking care of her ever since.

title.en: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.ru: Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником

altTitles.en: When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Starship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!

На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

altTitles.ja: エネアド

description.en: The once peaceful land of Egypt has been stained with blood under the tyrannical rule of Seth, the god of war. Horus, son of the god Isis but not yet one himself, rises to challenge the throne and put an end to the chaos and destruction. Although the confrontation between Seth and Horus began with hatred, in time it becomes blurred by obsession and desire... The ancient mythology of Egypt comes to life as you've never seen it before in this compelling fantasy BL.
description.es: La alguna vez pacífica tierra de Egipto se ha manchado de sangre bajo el gobierno tiránico de Seth, el dios de la guerra. Horus, hijo de la Diosa Isis pero no un dios aun, se levanta para desafiar el trono y poner fin al caos y la destrucción. Aunque la confrontación entre Seth y Horus comenzó con odio, con el tiempo se vuelve borrosa por la obsesión y el deseo …
description.uk: За давніх давен на мирній Єгипетській землі панував, заливаючи її кров'ю, нещадний тиран — бог війни Сет. Син богині Ісіди, Гор, хоч сам і не був богом, прийняв рішення покласти край кроволиттю й хаосу та звергнути Сета з божественного престолу. І хоча чвари між Сетом і Гором починаються з ненависті, з часом їхні взаємини стають тільки складнішими: здоровий глузд затьмарюють викривлені бажання, одержимість і безденна жорстокість.
description.pt-br: A outrora pacífica terra do Egito foi manchada de sangue sob o domínio tirânico de Seth, o deus da guerra. Hórus, filho da deusa Ísis, mas ainda não um, se levanta para desafiar o trono e pôr fim ao caos e à destruição. Embora o confronto entre Seth e Hórus tenha começado com ódio, com o tempo ele se tornou obscuro pela obsessão e pelo desejo... A antiga mitologia do Egito ganha vida como você nunca viu antes neste BL de fantasia envolvente.

title.en: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra

altTitles.en: The Male Leads Were Taken Away by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra

description.en:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

Um assassino lendário, reencarnou e se tornou a filha mais nova da família real

altTitles.en: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family.

description.pt-br:
“Babu-babu-babu-babu-babu-babu!?”
 (Estou me transformando em um bebê!?)

 Thoth, um assassino considerado uma lenda no submundo, é vendido por seus pais ainda jovem e criado estritamente como um assassino, por isso não conhece o amor de sua família.  Por capricho, ela salva um gato e morre, mas depois de morrer, está prestes a ser condenada ao inferno por tirar a vida de muitas pessoas.  No entanto, devido à sua boa ação de salvar um gato, ela pode reencarnar e renascer como a princesa do reino, Patricia.  Então, Deus ordena que ele salve os membros da família real – sua família.
 Ele deveria ter renascido como um bebê indefeso, mas suas habilidades de assassino não diminuíram e ele continua a lutar contra assassinos um após o outro.

 Aos poucos, surge o sentimento de querer proteger os membros da família real, que os amam incondicionalmente só porque são da família...?

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

description.en:
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. 

After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. 

He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. ……What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?

---

description.id: Murid ke-13 dari sekte Hwasan, Cheong Myeong, si pendekar pedang sakti bunga plum akhirnya berhasil membunuh kepala dari sekte iblis, Cheonma. Namun pertarungan tersebut telah merenggut nyawa Cheong Myeong sendiri beserta seluruh sekte Hwasan yang menjadi tempat perguruannya. Siapa yang menyangka, setelah kematiannya ternyata Cheong Myeong terlahir kembali 100 tahun kemudian! Tapi di masa ini tidak ada seorang pun yang mengingat Sekte Hwasan?! "...Apa? Sekte Hwasan hancur?!"
description.it:
Chung Myung, il 13esimo discepolo della Mount Hua Sec, uno dei 3 grandi spadaccini, Il santo della spada del fiore del pruno sconfisse Chun Ma, colui che ha portato distruzione e caos nel mondo.
Dopo la battaglia, esala il suo ultimo respiro in cima alla montagna del quartiere generale della Heavenly Demon Sect.

Ma, dopo 100 anni rinasce nel corpo di un bambino.
....Cosa? La mont Hua Sec è scomparsa? Cosa sta succedendo?
description.ko:
대 화산파 13대 제자.천하삼대검수 매화검존 청명.
천하를 혼란에 빠뜨린 고금제일마 천마의 목을 치고 십만대산의 정상에서 영면.
백 년의 시간을 뛰어넘어 아이의 몸으로 다시 살아나다.
......뭐? 화산이 망해? 이게 뭔 개소리야!?
description.ru:
13-й ученик великой школы Хуашань, один из трех величайших фехтовальщиков в мире - благородный клинок цветущей сливы Чхон Мён.
Последним ударом клинка он убивает Чхонма, повергшего весь мир в хаос, и погибает на вершине горы из голов тысячи демонов.
А спустя 100 лет он перерождается в теле ребенка, чтобы возродить из пепла некогда одну из самых великих, но ныне всеми забытую школу Мурима - Хуашань.
Цветки сливы рано или поздно опадают. Однако когда приходит холодная зима, а за ней - весна, слива распускается в своем полном великолепии.
description.th: สงครามกับเทพมารสิ้นสุดแล้ว และความตายที่ไม่อาจเลี่ยงได้กำลังคืบคลานมาหาข้าเช่นกัน ข้าผู้เป็นศิษย์รุ่น 13 แห่งฮวาซานได้ปลิดชีพเทพมารที่สั่นคลอนทั่วพิภพลงได้ในที่สุด และสิ้นสุดอายุขัยบนจุดสูงสุดของยอดเขา ...แต่พอข้าลืมตาขึ้นอีกที กลับกลายเป็นยาจกไร้กำลัง นี่ข้ากลับมาเกิดใหม่เป็นขอทานหรือนี่?!
description.zh:
剑尊大战魔尊后同归于尽！
百年后竟重生成柔弱孩童？
男主清明前世是闻名江湖的华山派梅花剑尊，耗尽全力消灭了武林魔头“天魔”，最终与其同归于尽。但他却在百年后重生成了一个落魄小乞丐，并且保留着前世所有记忆。而在现世，曾是江湖名派的“华山派”已经没落至无人知晓的地步，清明得知这一事实后不能接受。当他找到华山后，发现门派已油尽灯枯。但清明仍然还记得百年前门派的道义和武学精神，他很不甘心，于是以孩童之身重新拜入华山派门下。但入门后他才知道，原来门派没落竟与前世自己和天魔大战有关！孩童之身的他该如何重振门派雄风呢？
description.zh-hk: 華山派梅花劍尊青明與天魔同歸於盡後，再次醒來發現百年後的華山派竟已不屬於九派一幫，震驚之下他立志要讓華山派重振當年盛極一時的威風!

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

altTitles.ja: 空手小公子こひなたみのる
空手小公子小日向海流

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

[Submission for Yaoqi Village] [Submission for China Academy of Art]
Have you ever felt like this before? Like you're stuck, frozen in time, not sinking, but still exhausting yourself every day.
An old short story drawn in 2021. It's hard to recreate how I felt then. There's no words because I didn't know what and how to say it. Lacking self-control, I could only draw this to comfort myself the best that I could.
This is for our disjointed, disassociated, average lives. Dedicated to every ordinary person.

description.fr:
Après avoir surmonté de nombreux obstacles en tant que personne LGBTQ+, Prin est devenu une star à succès. Mais, il se réveille dans le corps d'un noble d'une époque révolue, « Volard », qui était homosexuel comme lui. Alors qu'il pensait d'abord mener une vie tranquille et trouver un moyen de retourner dans son monde d'origine, il se trouve entraîné dans des événements politiques imminents.
« Je me contente d'ignorer tout et de profiter des privilèges que je reçois en tant que fils du gouverneur. Je me fiche de savoir qui souffre... MAIS si je dois vivre dans ce monde où les personnes LGBTQ+ comme moi seront étiquetées comme mauvaises pour toujours, je parierai sur le fait de le changer moi-même ! »

altTitles.pt-br: Luz Dourada Gratia, a criança amada por Deus

altTitles.ko: 신의 사랑을 받는 아이, 황금빛 그라티아

description.en:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.
description.pt-br:
Gratia, uma menina considerada inútil e desprezada pela família, tem um sonho revelador onde um homem misterioso prevê um grande futuro para ela. Ela logo descobre que é a filha perdida da influente família Luciffero. Num acontecimento surpreendente, após ser atacada, uma luz dourada irrompe de Gratia, obrigando todos ao seu redor a fecharem os olhos.

Quando a luz se dissipa, a jovem Gratia desaparece e em seu lugar aparece uma versão adulta dela mesma, com características distintas de Luciffero. De estatura imponente e beleza inegável, ela se depara com Nea, sua mãe, e percebe que a transformação esperada para o futuro aconteceu naquele dia.

Este foi o momento em que Gratia, de dez anos, e Gratia, de vinte, trocaram de corpo pela primeira vez.

description.cs:
Láska je rozprávka. Alebo je? Koktavá dáma Maxi - najstaršia dcéra rodiny Croysovcov, vyrastá zneužívaná svojím otcom je nakoniec donútená vstúpiť do manželstva s rytierom Riftanom. Novomanželia spolu strávia prvú noc, po ktorej okamžite Riftan odchádza na výpravu. O tri roky neskôr sa triumfálne vracia ako slávny rytier. Všetky rozprávky sa končia svadbou a šťastným osudom. Ich láska sa začala svadbou - toto nie je rozprávka. Aké sú Riftanove zámery? Nájde Maxi silu prekonať svoju traumu a nedostatok sebadôvery? Prežije dvojica a nájde lásku napriek všetkým prekážkam?

description.en:
The daughter of a duke, the stuttering Maximilian, married a knight of lowly status at her father’s coercion. After their first night, her husband departed for an expedition without another word. He came back three years later, this time as a famous knight in the whole continent. How will Maximilian face him on his return?

"The more I think of you, the more lonely and lonely I become. I don't know why I can't quit even though it's so painful."

---
A flawless love story of the flawed. Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. Three years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. As life with her husband finally begins, she only has one question — does she deserve this love and happiness?

A dadogós Maximiliant házasságra kényszerítik Riftannal, aki azonban a nászéjszaka után hadjáratra indul. Három évvel később diadalmasan visszatér, készen arra, hogy újra a lánnyal legyen. Ahogy a várva várt örömteli élet elkezdődik a férjével, a lánynak csak egy kérdése van: Vajon megérdemli-e ezt a szerelmet és boldogságot?

description.it:
La figlia di un duca, la balbettante e insicura Maxine, sposò un cavaliere di umile condizione per la coercizione del padre. Dopo la loro prima notte, suo marito partì per una spedizione senza aggiungere altro. Tornò tre anni dopo, questa volta come famoso cavaliere in tutto il continente. Come l'affronterà Maxine al suo ritorno? "Più penso a te, più mi sento solo e vuoto. Non so perché, ma non riesco a smettere di pensarti anche se è così doloroso."

---
**Note:** Although the novel is R19, the webtoon is R15.

description.ko:
말더듬이 공작 영애 맥시밀리언은
아버지의 강요로 비천한 출생의 기사와 결혼하게 된다.
첫날밤을 치르고 원정을 떠나간 남편은
3년 후, 전 대륙에 명성을 떨치는 기사가 되어 돌아오는데….

**"너를 생각하면 생각할수록 나는 고독하고 외로워져
이렇게나 괴로운데도 그만 둘 수 없는 이유를 도무지 모르겠어."**
description.ru:
Дочь герцога, заика Максимилиана, вышла замуж за рыцаря низкого происхождения по настоянию её отца. После первой же ночи её муж отправился в военный поход, не сказав ни слова на прощание. Три года спустя он возвращается уже как рыцарь, прославленный на весь континент.
Как же теперь Максимилиана встретит его?

---

description.th:
“แม็กซิมิเลียน” ลูกสาวของดยุคผู้พูกติดอ่างถูกบังคับให้แต่งงานกับอัศวินที่ไร้ซึ่งยศถาบรรดาศักดิ์ “ริฟแทน” เพียงแค่คืนเดียวหลังวันแต่งงานริฟแทนก็ได้ออกเดินทางเพื่อทำศึกโดยไร้ซึ่งคำบอกกล่าวใด ๆ เมื่อเวลาผ่านไป3ปี เขาได้กลับมาพร้อมกับชัยชนะในฐานะของอัศวินผู้มีชื่อเสียงของอาณาจักร แล้วทีนี้แม็กซิมิเลียนจะเผชิญหน้ากับการกลับมาของเขาได้อย่างไร? "ยิ่งคิดถึงคุณเท่าไหร่ ฉันก็ยิ่งรู้สึกเหงาและเหงามากขึ้นเท่านั้น ฉันไม่รู้ว่าทำไมถึงไม่หยุดคิดเสียที แม้ว่ามันจะเจ็บปวดมาก็ตาม"

Bir dükün kızı olan kekeme Maximilian, babasının zorlamasıyla düşük statülü bir şövalyeyle evlendi. İlk gecelerinden sonra, kocası başka bir söz söylemeden bir sefer için yola çıktı. Üç yıl sonra, bu seferden tüm kıtada ünlü bir şövalye olarak geri döner.. Maximilian, dönüşünde onunla nasıl yüzleşecek?

description.uk:
Дочка герцога, заїка Максимілліан, через свого батька, насильно вийшла заміж за лицаря низького статусу. Після першої шлюбної ночі, він не проронивши ні слова відправився на експедицію. Після якої повернувся вже відомим на всьому континенті Майстром мечу. Як Максимілліан зустріне його?
«Чим більше я думаю про тебе, тим більш мені стає самотньо. Я не знаю чому я не можу покинути тебе, хоч це і робить мені так боляче.»

description.zh:
天生性格内向、有些口吃的公爵家小姐，在父亲的强迫之下嫁给了平民出身的骑士。大婚之夜过后边奔赴战场的丈夫，3年之后成为了全大陆最知名的骑士，荣归故里。我似乎听到了他的呢喃，“这些年越想起你，越觉得自己很孤独。我想找到，为何如此痛苦却始终对你放心不下的原因。”

description.en: A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

altTitles.ja: エックス

description.en:
From Viz:  
Kamui Shiro is a young man who was born with the power to decide the fate of the Earth itself–a destiny he can barely bring himself to believe. But as other players in the prophecy begin to gather around him–the "Seven Seals," with the power to protect the Earth, and the "Seven Harbingers," who are fated to destroy it–he has no choice but to come to terms with his fate.

altTitles.ja: ねこぢるうどん

description.en: Short stories about two anthropomorphic white cats who have no respect and are just plain cruel. Dark humor warning.

altTitles.ja: 少女星間漂流記

description.en: A spaceship in the shape of a horse-drawn carriage travels across the galaxy. Riding in the carriage is Ridley, the scientist who built this eccentric spaceship, and her partner Watari, a shy girl. The two leave Earth, which has become uninhabitable due to environmental pollution, and set off in the carriage. Their goal is to find a safe planet to settle. However, all the planets they visit are very strange! A planet with a god who can bring all things back to life, another planet where the luckiest people are considered the greatest, and a planet with countless libraries… The two girls are sometimes thrown for a loop by these strange worlds…

description.fr: « Je n'ai besoin ni d'amour ni de reconnaissance. Ce dont j'ai besoin, c'est de pouvoir. ». Après avoir affronté la mort sans en comprendre les raisons, elle découvre les secrets de la mortalité. Alors qu'elle lutte, l'esprit de la mort apparaît aux côtés d'Azelda, lui offrant une nouvelle chance de vivre. Pour devenir un esprit redoutable dans sa quête de vengeance, elle se consacre à son entraînement. « Tu dois passer la nuit ici avec moi », insiste-t-elle. Faisant fi des sentiments, Azelda s'adresse d'abord à son mari, Seid, qui lui a tourné le dos dans leur quête commune de pouvoir et de vengeance.

altTitles.ko-ro: 차라리 내가 왕이 되는 게 나을 것 같다

altTitles.en: I Think It Would Be Better For Me to Become King

description.en:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.
description.fr:
Je me suis finalement procurée le jeu que je désirais depuis longtemps. Alors que je profitais de ma vie avec Cédric, mon seul choix, au moment où j'ai appuyé sur la dernière option, [la reine Astarote, qui a osé prétendre être du sang royale du précédent roi, a été condamnée à mort !].
"Quel gâchis, si j'avais été à sa place, j'aurais fait mieux que ça !"
Et dès que j'ai dit ça, je suis entrée dans le jeu immédiatement.
"Au revoir, Astarote."
"Je veux juste que tu meures, Astarote."
J'ai essayé de nombreuses façons de faire de mon mari le roi, mais à la fin, j'ai toujours été confrontée à la mort. Je n'en peux plus.
"Si je continue ainsi, je serai toujours tuée, il ne me reste plus qu'une seule solution !"
"Je pense que ça serait mieux que je devienne ROI."
[Une nouvelle voie a été ouverte.]

altTitles.ja: 君と掴む光。

description.en:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

Chae Yu-ra is an ordinary girl who likes to watch online game broadcasts. She becomes the sole sponsor of an unknown streamer, Choi Ji-hyuk, who plays a virtual reality game called Constellation. But one day, she wakes up inside the game and discovers that she is Choi Ji-hyuk's constellation, which means she can grant him wishes and powers.

Choi Ji-hyuk, on the other hand, is an elite hunter who is determined to take revenge on the constellation that abandoned him in the past. He is unaware that his constellation is actually Chae Yu-ra, the girl he despises for her lack of skill at the game. How will they relate to each other in this dangerous world full of mysteries?
description.es-la:
El único error que he cometido hasta ahora es ver una transmisión sin espectadores de un juego online.
Mi único crimen fue patrocinar a alguien duramente.
ㅤ
Pero ahora lo entiendo.
¡Hacerme pasar por esta terrible experiencia es demasiado duro!
ㅤ
"¡No podemos perder más tiempo"
"¡Espera un minuto, déjame comprar esta armadura"
ㅤ
"¿Qué es esto?"
Me pregunté mientras veía esa transmisión antes de que eso pasara.

___________________________________________________
ㅤ
Choi Ji-hyuk miró fijamente el artículo que venía como recompensa de una Mazmorra de Clase S.
Era un objeto obtenido que había arrebatado a los otros Cazadores que intentaban obtenerllo.
ㅤ
"No importa cuanto impida este objeto la destrucción del mundo"
"No importa si es un objeto por el que arriesgué mi vida"
"Incluso si muero, seré miserable, por eso, si es he de morir, al menos quiero ver la cara de esa maldita Constelación"
ㅤ
Pero, ¿quién hubiera pensado que esa Constelación era una chica que parecía tener poco más de 20 años?
ㅤ
"Chae Yu-ra"
ㅤ
Él lo lamentó por ella, quien había vivido una vida normal y pacífica toda su vida, desafortunadamente, nunca tuvo la intención de abandonar a su Constelación.
ㅤ
"Dime que soy lo más importante para ti"
ㅤ
Al menos así será hasta que llegue el fin del mundo
ㅤ
"Dímelo"

title.en: The Male Leads Trapped in My House

description.en:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters…  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys don’t seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

“Who exactly are you?”  
“You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.”  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldn’t answer them. They wouldn’t believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

“Alright, let’s work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!”  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, I’ll make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?

altTitles.ja: 大悪党少年

description.en: The manga's story teases of a boy who thinks everything in the world is worthless: the heroes who pretend to fight with grace, his classmates who only know how to flock together, and his own weak, miserable self. That is why the boy aspires to be the lonely, solitary, and ultimate villain, to change himself and the world.
description.pt-br: A história do mangá provoca a narrativa de um garoto que acredita que tudo no mundo é inútil: os heróis que fingem lutar com graça, seus colegas de classe que só sabem agir em bando e seu próprio eu fraco e miserável. É por isso que o garoto aspira ser o vilão solitário, isolado e supremo, para mudar a si mesmo e ao mundo.

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

title.en: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom

altTitles.ja: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaigeganai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

altTitles.en: The Saint Whose Engagement Was Broken When She Became Too Perfect Is Sold off to a Neighboring Kingdom

altTitles.th: เพราะสมบูรณ์แบบจนไม่น่ารัก สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์จึงถูกถอนหมั้นและขายไปอาณาจักรข้างเคียง

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaige ga nai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

description.en:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
description.ja: “聖女”を代々輩出する家系に生まれたフィリアは、幼少からのスパルタ教育により「歴代最高の聖女」と評される程の実力を身につけ、完璧に仕事をこなしていた。だが、あまりの隙のなさに「完璧すぎて可愛げがない」と腫れ物のように扱われ、婚約者の第二王子ユリウスからも婚約破棄をされてしまう――。さらに“聖女”が不在のため苦しむ隣国との取引でフィリアは、莫大な金を対価に売られることに。隣国での悲惨な扱いを覚悟するフィリアだったが、待っていたのは予想外の大歓迎で……!?
description.pt-br: A família de Philia vem produzindo santos por gerações. Não é nenhuma surpresa que ela seja conhecida como a maior santa de todos os tempos e esteja prestes a se casar com o segundo príncipe, Julius. O que ninguém espera é que Julius cancele o noivado, alegando que a perfeição de Philia a torna sem charme e antipática. Para piorar a situação, Philia é enviada para um país vizinho em troca de ouro e recursos, forçando-a a deixar sua terra natal! Apesar de se preparar para maus-tratos, Philia encontra uma recepção calorosa em sua nova cidade, onde ela faz bom uso de suas habilidades santas, erguendo barreiras contra monstros e curando epidemias. Mas enquanto ela floresce em sua nova vida, sua terra natal está sob ameaça de destruição!

altTitles.ja: 夢色パティシエール

description.en:
Amano Ichigo is a clumsy 14-year-old girl whose only "outstanding" trait is an incomparable love of sweets. Constantly overshadowed by her near genius-pianist little sister, Ichigo looked forward to a Sweets Festival to lift her spirits a bit; and lo and behold, a taste takes her by the tongue, leading her to Henri Lucas- a world-famous master patissier. She's not the only one enthralled; Henri is sure she's someone amazing, and gives her a recommendation to St. Marie Academy, a school famous for turning out master patissieres!  
  
No sooner than she transfers, Ichigo finds herself amongst the biggest big-shots of the entire middle school, and faced with more troubles than her klutzy self is quite ready to handle. But with the help of her "Sweets Spirit" Vanilla… who knows what'll be possible?

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

description.en:
The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
description.ko:
퇴마사가 귀신인 나에게 반해버렸다...?! 
퇴마사로부터 살아남기 위해 거짓 고백을 해버린 한 귀신의 생존 서바이벌 연애기
description.ru: Вы бы признались кому-то в любви, если бы это означало спасение вашей жизни? Ну, это то, что я сделал. Я призрак по имени Умин, а моя девушка - охотница за привидениями. Довольно банально, я знаю... Честно говоря, я не знаю, как мне избавиться от нее, но я не могу позволить ей просто убить меня!

altTitles.ja: 異世界でスローライフを（願望）

altTitles.en: I Have a Slow Life in a Different World (I Wish)
Slow Life In Another World (I Wish!)

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界過慢生活（願望）

altTitles.pt-br: Vida lenta em outro mundo (Eu espero!)

altTitles.ru: Размеренной жизни бы в ином мире (мечта)

altTitles.vi: Tôi có một cuộc sống bình yên ở thế giới khác (Tôi ước là thế)

description.en: By the will of the goddess, Itsuki Shinomiya was given the privilege of choosing various abilities and being reborn in another world. However, before going to the other world, he didn't want to involve himself in scary, dirty, gross things like battles. Fiercely determined to live a slow life, he chose the unique skill [Pocket Money], giving him an amount of money once per day. "With this, I can hang out with girls without having to work!" Dreaming of avoiding battles and living with cute girls, Itsuki stepped into the other world! But the reality was not that simple. Getting attacked by giant bugs, getting caught up in arguments at the guild, and getting stuck with slaves?! In the end, will Itsuki be able to live his ideal slow life?! Using unique skills and manufacturing skills, an exciting other-world slow life with beautiful girls starts now! (hopefully)
description.ja:
異世界での第二の人生は…とにかく楽したい!!

忍宮一樹――心も身体もすり減らして働くサラリーマンは、夢のスローライフを目指して異世界へと降り立った。だが、夢の実現のための切り札、一日一回お金を生み出せる『お小遣い』スキルでは全く足りず、やむなく働くハメに。なんとか“錬金術師ギルド”に就職し、スローライフの第一歩…と思いきや、営業先の“冒険者ギルド”では難癖をつけられてしまう。さらには美女から「あなたの奴隷になる」と宣言され大混乱！ どうなる俺の異世界ライフ!?
description.pt-br: Pela vontade da deusa, Itsuki Shinomiya recebeu o privilégio de escolher várias habilidades e renascer em outro mundo. No entanto, antes de ir para o outro mundo, ele não queria se envolver em coisas assustadoras, sujas e grosseiras como batalhas. Ferozmente determinado a viver uma vida lenta, ele escolheu a habilidade única [Pocket Money], dando a ele uma quantia em dinheiro uma vez por dia. “Com isso, posso sair com as garotas sem precisar trabalhar!”. Sonhando em evitar batalhas e viver com lindas garotas, Itsuki entrou no outro mundo! Mas a realidade não era tão simples. Ser atacado por insetos gigantes, se envolver em discussões na guilda e ficar preso a escravos? No final, Itsuki será capaz de viver sua vida lenta ideal? Usando habilidades únicas e habilidades de fabricação, uma emocionante vida lenta de outro mundo com lindas garotas começa agora.

description.en:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
description.es: Ella tuvo que pasar por la aniquilación de su familia, él llegó al final de su vida para darle la oportunidad de vengarse. “Aiana.” El caballero que estuvo a mi lado durante 13 años, arriesgó su vida, sufrió, pasó hambre y lo dio todo por mí. Pero ahora, al presentarse mi muerte inminente, sonreía felizmente mientras contemplaba mi desceso. “Por favor, ten una historia agradable esta vez, mi señora”. El demonio sonrió y me tendió la mano. “Espero que en la próxima historia obtengas el final que deseas”

altTitles.ja: フランケン・ふらん

description.en:
There is a Gothic-style mansion in a distant, rarely-visited part of Japan. There, the world's greatest surgeon, Naomitsu Madaraki, once lived but he hasn't come home in ages.  
  
Instead, the professor's "daughter," Fran Madaraki, lives there with a large amount of her own ghoulish creations and her "younger sister" Veronica. She's a very unusual girl, what with the stitch patterns on her face and the giant bolts on either side of her head. Just as skilled at surgery as her father, and if you're willing to pay her price, she can do everything up to and including raising the dead. Fran believes that a life should be saved no matter the cost, and keep that in mind, since the results of her surgeries are rarely (if ever) pretty.  
  
  
Fran can make anyone into anything, raise the dead, switch heads and bodies, and give you those eyes that you've always wanted. But do you actually want them? Is it a good thing to raise the dead? Do the ends justify the means? And does Fran care?
description.pt-br: Fran pode transformar qualquer um em qualquer coisa, ressuscitar os mortos, trocar cabeças e corpos, e te dar aquele visual que você sempre quis. Mas você quer mesmo isso? É seguro acordar os mortos? Os fins justificam os meios? A Fran liga pra isso?
